user.title: Set up MeteoLux Weather
user.description: MeteoLux provides accurate weather forecasts for Luxembourg. Configure your location and preferences below.

data_description.location: Click on the map to select your location in Luxembourg. Drag the marker to adjust the position.
data_description.name: Friendly name for this location (used in entity names)
data_description.update_interval_current: How often to update current weather conditions (1-60 minutes). Lower values provide more up-to-date data but increase API requests. Default: 10 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_hourly: How often to update hourly forecasts (5-120 minutes). Hourly forecasts typically don't change as frequently. Default: 30 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_daily: How often to update daily forecasts (1-24 hours). Daily forecasts are stable and don't need frequent updates. Default: 6 hours.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure: {name}
reconfigure.description: Update location, language, and update intervals. Changes will be applied immediately and the integration will reload.

data_description.location: Click on the map to select a new location. Drag the marker to adjust the position.
data_description.name: Friendly name for this location (used in entity names)
data_description.update_interval_current: How often to update current weather conditions (1-60 minutes). Default: 10 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_hourly: How often to update hourly forecasts (5-120 minutes). Default: 30 minutes.
data_description.update_interval_daily: How often to update daily forecasts (1-24 hours). Default: 6 hours.

reconfigure_entity_ids.title: Entity ID Options
reconfigure_entity_ids.description:
The integration name has changed from '{old_name}' to '{new_name}'.

Choose how to handle entity IDs:

data_description.entity_id_action: Select whether to keep existing entity IDs or regenerate them to match the new name

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to MeteoLux API. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.latitude_out_of_bounds: Latitude must be between 49.4 and 50.2 (Luxembourg boundaries). Please adjust your selection.
error.longitude_out_of_bounds: Longitude must be between 5.7 and 6.5 (Luxembourg boundaries). Please adjust your selection.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This location is already configured. Each location can only be added once. To add weather for a different location, use different coordinates.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Configuration updated successfully. The integration will reload automatically to apply the new settings.

options.keep: Keep existing entity IDs — Preserve current entity IDs to maintain automations, scripts, and dashboards
options.regenerate: Regenerate entity IDs — Update entity IDs to match new name (e.g., 'sensor.old_name_current_weather' → 'sensor.new_name_current_weather'). ⚠️ This will break existing automations and dashboards.
